        def matches? subject
          @subject = subject
          responds? && has_column? && included?
        end

has_column?()

Source: show 

# File lib/paperclip/matchers/have_attached_file_matcher.rb, line 39
        def has_column?
          @subject.column_names.include?("#{@attachment_name}_file_name")
        end
included?()

Source: show 

# File lib/paperclip/matchers/have_attached_file_matcher.rb, line 43
        def included?
          @subject.ancestors.include?(Paperclip::InstanceMethods)
        end
responds?()

Source: show 

# File lib/paperclip/matchers/have_attached_file_matcher.rb, line 32
        def responds?
          methods = @subject.instance_methods.map(&:to_s)
          methods.include?("#{@attachment_name}") &&
            methods.include?("#{@attachment_name}=") &&
            methods.include?("#{@attachment_name}?")
        end
